response.original_title: ナンパJAPAN検証企画！女子大生限定！リア友同士で初めての相互オナニー！！2人だけの密室で高評価オナグッズを使った自慰を互いに観察！してたら友情ぶち壊し性欲に身を委ね発情セックスしちゃうのか！？
response.overview: Only for college students in estrus! "Why don't you monitor your health goods (ona goods)?" Take a couple of male and female students who you see in the city with friends to your room! Popular masturbation goods were handed over! We asked them to try a game that tests friendship for 30,000 yen just by observing each other and 100,000 yen for SEX! A male and female friend who was alone in a closed room with a hidden camera ... had sex with each other by mutual masturbation using cutting-edge masturbation goods!
response.tagline: Will They Destroy Their Friendship And Allow Their Sexual Hunger To Take Over!?
response.title: A NANPA JAPAN Investigative Variety Special! College Girl Babes Only! Real Friends Are Experiencing Their First Ever Mutual Masturbation!! The 2 Of Them Are Playing With Expensive Masturbation Toys And Studying Each Other As They Jack Off!
